column1: Smoque BBQ////Smoque provided the dinner at our wedding
column2: and it was delicious! Peggy helped us finalize our menu
column3: and made sure our buffet had a variety of sides and protein. Maria supported our wedding day-of
column4: and made sure that everything went smoothly. Smoque even let us borrow a sign holder so that we could make sure all of our signage was consistent (we had two catering companies). Our guests LOVED the food - the brisket was a HUGE hit. Peggy and Maria are so incredible and made sure we felt special. This team is amazing
column5: and we can't wait to be back for our next meal at Smoque.
